text: Nick G. Sibbeston (born November 21, 1943) is a retired Canadian Senator. He represented the Northwest Territories. He was nominated to the Senate by Liberal prime minister Jean Chr√©tien in 1999 and sat until 2017, when he resigned on his 74th birthday. He was Premier of the Northwest Territories from 1985 to 1987. ==References== Category:Premiers of the Northwest Territories Category:1943 births Category:Living people
title: Nick Sibbeston
